text: North of the Border is a 1946 American western film. It was directed by B. Reeves Eason and based on a story by James Oliver Curwood. Many of the same cast and crew also worked on 'Neath Canadian Skies. ==References== ==External links== *North of the Border at IMDb Category:1946 films Category:1946 Western (genre) films Category:English-language films Category:Lippert Pictures films Category:American Western (genre) films Category:Films directed by B. title: North of the Border (film)
